SEARCH
Package Patients

Class PatientRegistry

java.lang.Object
Patients.PatientRegistry
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserRegistry<Patient>
public class PatientRegistry extends Object implements UserRegistry<Patient>
The PatientRegistry class manages a collection of Patient objects, allowing for operations such as adding, finding, deleting, and updating patient data. It can also reload the registry from a CSV file.

    • findUserByID

      public Patient findUserByID(String userID)
      Finds a patient by their unique ID.
      Specified by:
      findUserByID in interface UserRegistry<Patient>
      Parameters:
      userID - The unique ID of the patient to find.
      Returns:
      The Patient object if found, or null if not found.

    • reloadRegistry

      public void reloadRegistry()
      Reloads the patient registry by reading from the CSV file. This method replaces the current list of patients with the refreshed list loaded from the file.

    • deletePatientByID

      public boolean deletePatientByID(String userID)
      Deletes a patient by their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      userID - The unique ID of the patient to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the patient was found and removed, false if not found.

    • updatePatientPassword

      public boolean updatePatientPassword(String userID, String newPassword)
      Updates the password of a patient identified by their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      userID - The unique ID of the patient whose password is to be updated.
      newPassword - The new password to set for the patient.
      Returns:
      true if the password was successfully updated, false if the patient was not found.

    • printAllPatients

      public void printAllPatients()
      Prints the details of all patients in the registry.
